thread.section_title: Lenskart Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lenskart | lenskart.com
thread.title: Abinash

author: Abinash
title: Abinash
text: It was a great buy from Lenskart for the second time in the last four years. The first time i bought glasses i was unsure of the quality and my having cylindrical power make me a bigger skeptic. Lenskart came out with flying colours, and i got very affordable and sturdy glasses, which gave me perfect vision till the glasses worn away - literally. The second time i have bought a pair of glasses, one for main use and one backup. I would say go ahead with the choices, and if anything doesn't feel right, they are always there to return, repair, fix and refund if needed. :)
